div.p: With DeltaXML's XSLT/XPath extension, Visual Studio Code is now a fully featured XSLT editor, standalone XPath files are also fully supported. Visual Studio's rich ecosystem is now available to XSLT and XPath developers.

This part of the documentation focuses on XSLT and XPath language features. More general XML features are covered on the Editing XML page. Fuller but language-neutral descriptions of the features covered here can be found in Microsoft's Visual Studio Code User Guide.
